      • transitionAnimation

        public void transitionAnimation(double pauseDuration,
                                double tranDuration,
                                javafx.scene.layout.StackPane... args)
        Constructor sets the desired pause duration, the desired transition duration and adds the animation for all components provided as parameters
        Parameters:
        pauseDuration - how long the component will be showing
        tranDuration - how long will take between the transitions
        args - components to be animated
        See Also:
        SequentialTransition
